title: Butter Cauliflower
instructions: Combine cauliflower, ginger garlic paste, red chilli powder and olive oil in a bowl. Mix to combine.
Dice the onion, quarter the tomatoes.
Brown the onion in 1 tablespoon of butter for 2-3 minutes. Add tomatoes, cashews, garlic paste, garam masala, white sugar, red chilli powder, vinegar and water.
Move sauce to a bowl and blend until completly smooth with a stick blender.
Move the sauce back into the pot passing it through a fine mess sieve to remove any small particles.
Add the roasted cauliflower into the sauce.
Add the remaining butter to the sauce and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
